name: Enigmo
summary: Enigmo and Enigmo 2 are respectively 2D and 3D arcade-style computer games for personal computer (PC), Mac OS 9, Mac OS X, iOS and PlayStation Minis developed by Pangea Software. They both involve moving certain substances into their proper containers. The music in both games was recorded by Michael Beckett.
info:
• 中文名: 魔法水滴
